policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/kube-system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/kube-system:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/kube-system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/kube-system:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation1223.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation1230.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation149.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation159.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation1
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

  namespace: default
spec:

    name: container1

      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation212.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation216.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation219.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:

        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation236.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation263.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation289.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation2:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation2
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    securityContext: {}
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation3115.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation313.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation315.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation316.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation318.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation3280.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation3303.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

spec:
  containers:

    name: initcontainer1

  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: allowprivilegeescalation352.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/allowprivilegeescalation3:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: allowprivilegeescalation3
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

---

##### FILE: alluxioruntime_controller.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/alluxioruntime-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
  name: alluxioruntime-controller
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        controller.runtime.fluid.io/replicas: dynamic_parameters
      labels:
        control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: NotIn
                values:
                - virtual-kubelet
      containers:
      - args:
        - --development=false
        - --runtime-node-port-range=dynamic_parameters
        - --runtime-workers=dynamic_parameters
        - --pprof-addr=:6060
        - --enable-leader-election
        - --leader-election-namespace=dynamic_parameters
        - --port-allocate-policy=dynamic_parameters
        command:
        - alluxioruntime-controller
        - start
        env:
        - name: FLUID_WORKDIR
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: DEFAULT_INIT_IMAGE_ENV
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ALLUXIO_RUNTIME_IMAGE_ENV
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ALLUXIO_FUSE_IMAGE_ENV
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: MOUNT_ROOT
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: CRITICAL_FUSE_POD
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: FLUID_SYNC_RETRY_DURATION
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: IMAGE_PULL_SECRETS
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: HELM_DRIVER
          value: dynamic_parameters
        - name: ALLUXIO_MOUNT_CONFIG_STORAGE
          value: dynamic_parameters
        image: dynamic_parameters
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 1536Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
      imagePullSecrets: null
      serviceAccountName: alluxioruntime-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations: null

---

##### FILE: alluxioruntime_controller1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to fluid-system/Deployment/alluxioruntime-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
  name: alluxioruntime-controller
  namespace: fluid-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: alluxioruntime-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --development=true
        command:
        - alluxioruntime-controller
        - start
        env:
        - name: MOUNT_ROOT
          value: /alluxio-mnt
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
      serviceAccountName: alluxioruntime-controller
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists

---
